data.lyric:
[ti:IDGAF (Explicit)]
[ar:BoyWithUke/blackbear]
[al:IDGAF (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]IDGAF (Explicit) - BoyWithUke/blackbear
[00:00.17]Lyrics by：BoyWithUke/Matthew Musto
[00:00.35]Composed by：BoyWithUke/Matthew Musto
[00:00.53]BoyWithUke：
[00:00.57]You were caught in a lie said it with your eyes
[00:03.12]Said to all my homies that you weren't even mine
[00:05.51]You didn't think twice got a heart made of ice
[00:07.94]And that s**t hit me did me dirty
[00:10.56]I never asked why and I never did cry
[00:12.85]I never told another how I felt inside
[00:15.56]My demons don't hide when I'm dreaming at night
[00:17.71]And I won't mislead you you'll miss me
[00:19.44]BoyWithUke/blackbear：
[00:20.31]'Cause I don't give a f**k about you no more
[00:22.71]Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors
[00:25.12]You weren't even pretty lookin' back and I'm sure
[00:27.60]You still miss me that's so funny
[00:30.04]I don't give a f**k about you you swore
[00:32.43]You would never talk about me before
[00:34.82]You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
[00:37.35]You still kissed me now s**t's history
[00:39.01]Blackbear：
[00:39.24]
[00:39.77]I don't mind if we speak again
[00:42.22]I don't wanna be cool I don't wanna be friends
[00:44.61]Leave me half alive on my homies you was flirty
[00:47.20]Filled me up with lies and you did me so dirty
[00:49.66]'Cause I don't give a f**k about you no more
[00:52.02]Left me bleedin' with my heart on the floor
[00:54.46]You were never really mine I was never really yours
[00:56.85]You're the demon on my shoulder I'm just tryin' to ignore
[00:59.36]And I don't give a s**t about your fake-a*s friends
[01:01.91]Hollywood Hills while we play pretend
[01:04.16]I don't wanna say "I'm sorry" I don't wanna make amends
[01:06.56]I will never make a mistake like you again
[01:09.21]'Cause I don't give a f**k about you no more
[01:11.63]Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors
[01:14.06]You weren't even pretty lookin' back and I'm sure
[01:16.45]You still miss me that's so funny
[01:18.98]I don't give a f**k about you you swore
[01:21.29]You would never talk about me before
[01:23.13]
[01:23.65]You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
[01:26.24]You still kissed me now s**t's history
[01:28.17]BoyWithUke：
[01:28.58]
[01:29.33]Regardless you're so heartless
[01:31.41]Lead my heart into your darkness
[01:33.72]Hid the truth behind your harmless pretty face
[01:37.55]Aww
[01:38.78]And I know you're runnin' out of other options
[01:41.24]Live in your head rent free a neurotoxin
[01:43.70]And I wake up every morning with a smile in my face
[01:46.21]Knowin' full well you were put up for adoption
[01:47.98]Oh
[01:48.76]Oh s**t yeah I went there but honestly I don't care
[01:51.48]You never tried to play fair with me
[01:53.66]Left me broken with scars makin' all these remarks
[01:56.12]So now this is the part where I leave
[01:57.65]BoyWithUke/blackbear：
[01:58.17]'Cause I don't give a f**k about you no more
[02:00.27]No more
[02:00.71]Give me back my hoodies or I'm kickin' down doors
[02:02.69]Down doors
[02:03.16]You weren't even pretty lookin' back and I'm sure
[02:04.95]
[02:05.45]You still miss me that's so funny
[02:07.83]I don't give a f**k about you you swore
[02:09.91]You swore
[02:10.43]You would never talk about me before
[02:12.36]Before
[02:12.67]You lied lookin' filthy in your ugly jean shorts
[02:15.27]You still kissed me now s**t's history
data.trans:
[ti:IDGAF (Explicit)]
[ar:BoyWithUke/blackbear]
[al:IDGAF (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.17]//
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.53]//
[00:00.57]你的谎言已被戳穿 你的眼神出卖了一切
[00:03.12]在我所有的朋友面前说 你根本不是我的专属
[00:05.51]你不曾犹豫分毫 你的心冷若冰霜
[00:07.94]但我依然心神荡漾 你不怀好意地接近我
[00:10.56]我从未问过原因 我从未伤心落泪
[00:12.85]我从未告诉另一个人我心里的感受
[00:15.56]深夜时分 当我进入梦乡时 我的心魔不会躲起来
[00:17.71]我不会误导你 你会想念我
[00:19.44]//
[00:20.31]因为我再也不会在乎你
[00:22.71]将我的连帽衫还给我 否则我会一脚踹开门
[00:25.12]现在回想起来 我确信你也没有那么漂亮
[00:27.60]你依然想念着我 竟是如此可笑
[00:30.04]我对你熟视无睹 你郑重起誓
[00:32.43]以前你对我闭口不提
[00:34.82]你谎话连篇 你穿着丑陋的牛仔短裤 看上去卑劣无耻
[00:37.35]你依然与我拥吻 现在一切都已成往事
[00:39.01]//
[00:39.24]
[00:39.77]如果我们再次交谈 我并不介意
[00:42.22]我不想故作淡定 我不想以朋友的身份相处
[00:44.61]让我变得奄奄一息 对着我的朋友发誓 你妩媚动人
[00:47.20]用谎言欺骗我 你如此卑劣地对待我
[00:49.66]因为我再也不会在乎你
[00:52.02]让我心如刀割 将我的真心弃如敝履
[00:54.46]你从来都不属于我 我也不是非你莫属
[00:56.85]你就是我肩膀上的恶魔 我只是视而不见
[00:59.36]我对你的狐朋狗友不屑一顾
[01:01.91]在好莱坞山 我们逢场作戏
[01:04.16]我不想道歉 我不想弥补过错
[01:06.56]我再也不会爱上像你这样的女孩
[01:09.21]因为我再也不会在乎你
[01:11.63]将我的连帽衫还给我 否则我会一脚踹开门
[01:14.06]现在回想起来 我确信你也没有那么漂亮
[01:16.45]你依然想念着我 竟是如此可笑
[01:18.98]我对你熟视无睹 你郑重起誓
[01:21.29]以前你对我闭口不提
[01:23.13]
[01:23.65]你谎话连篇 你穿着丑陋的牛仔短裤 看上去卑劣无耻
[01:26.24]你依然与我拥吻 现在一切都已成往事
[01:28.17]//
[01:28.58]
[01:29.33]不管怎样 你是如此冷酷无情
[01:31.41]指引我的心潜入你的黑暗之中
[01:33.72]将真相隐藏在你看似天真无邪的漂亮脸蛋背后
[01:37.55]//
[01:38.78]我知道你已经别无选择
[01:41.24]萦绕在你的脑海里 不用付出任何代价 就像是一种神经毒素
[01:43.70]每天清晨 我面带微笑 从睡梦中醒来
[01:46.21]我非常清楚你被人收养的事实
[01:47.98]//
[01:48.76]该死 我曾经爱过你 但是说实话 我并不在乎
[01:51.48]你从未全心全意地对待我
[01:53.66]让我肝肠寸断 浑身伤痕 对我恶语相向
[01:56.12]所以现在就是我该离开的时候了
[01:57.65]//
[01:58.17]因为我再也不会在乎你
[02:00.27]再也不会
[02:00.71]将我的连帽衫还给我 否则我会一脚踹开门
[02:02.69]一脚踹开门
[02:03.16]现在回想起来 我确信你也没有那么漂亮
[02:04.95]
[02:05.45]你依然想念着我 竟是如此可笑
[02:07.83]我对你熟视无睹 你郑重起誓
[02:09.91]你郑重起誓
[02:10.43]以前你对我闭口不提
[02:12.36]以前
[02:12.67]你谎话连篇 你穿着丑陋的牛仔短裤 看上去卑劣无耻
[02:15.27]你依然与我拥吻 现在一切都已成往事
